researchQuestionText: Can a mechanically perfect, economically rational, legally enforceable peace settlement end the war in Ukraine within the constraints of the current international system?
methodText: On the night between December the 3rd and December the 4th, we used adversarial AI collaboration to iteratively design Protocol Omega—addressing every known diplomatic failure mode through self-executing enforcement, positive-sum economics, and trust-free operation.
resultText: Unanimous rejection by four simulated decision-makers with veto power
conclusionText: Peace is architecturally impossible under current rules
bug1Description: Binary territorial logic makes any ambiguity existentially threatening
bug2Description: Strategic assets are weapons, not commodities—sharing control equals strategic defeat
bug3Description: Great powers optimize for rival disadvantage over absolute stability
bug4Description: Actors profit from instability without penalty
timelineIntro: Quantitative analysis reveals convergent exhaustion across multiple domains:
financialText: Debt service exceeding capacity, crossover points 2028-2035
windowText: 5-10 years for building alternatives before crisis makes preparation impossible
world1Description: System continues until convergent exhaustion. Cascading failures exceed capacity. Fragmentation into warlordism. 150-300 year dark age.
world2Description: Crisis triggers 2030-2038. Alternative architectures ready. Coordinated transition. Post-Westphalian governance by 2050-2060.
world3Description: Technological breakthrough solves scarcity. Psychological evolution enables voluntary constraints. System self-reforms. Structurally implausible.
impactStatement: Each 30-point increase in Preparedness Index = ~5% shift from World 1 → World 2 = 10-15 million lives saved (2035-2050)
researchPackageIntro: Every iteration of Protocol Omega's design and stress-testing, showing the progression from initial concept to bulletproof edition, followed by unanimous rejection. Full transparency on methodology.
ctaText: The experiment is complete. The system is terminal. The work now shifts from negotiation to construction. We have ~5 years to build the replacement kernel.
ctaFooter: The lights will go out. Begin lighting candles.
fallbackNotice: Some sections are displayed in English as Swedish translation is not yet available.
epigraph: This is not a warning. This is a death certificate.
paperSubtitle: An Empirical Demonstration of the Nation-State System's Terminal Incompatibility with Planetary Peace
closingEpigraph: The lights will go out. Begin lighting candles.
endOfPaper: END OF WHITE PAPER | BEGINNING OF SALVAGE
researchPackageDescription: 13 documents showing the evolution from initial concept to unanimous rejection
researchPackageLongDescription: This research package contains the complete, unedited iteration history of the Omega Experiment. Every document, every critique, every refinement—transparent documentation of how we built the most sophisticated peace mechanism possible, and how it was systematically rejected by all four veto players.
synthesisDescription: Generate initial frameworks and conceptual innovations
challengeDescription: Rewrite for realpolitik, execute red team attacks, stress-test mechanics
integrationDescription: Identify vulnerabilities, propose structural improvements, assess feasibility
documentationDescription: Compile findings into rigorous analysis and white paper
readyToDiveDescription: Start from the beginning to see the complete evolution, or jump to any phase that interests you.
author: Author
visualAssetsDescription: Interactive diagrams illustrating key findings from The Omega Proof
downloadVisualsDescription: Get all diagrams as high-resolution SVG files
